attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish Student Debt!!
If the banks get their debt wiped out by the government, why shouldnt TAXPAYERS who are losing over 9% of there monthly income to pay student loans, get there debt cleared?!! With petrol and electricity costs soaring, and wages only gettin the minimal increase, why should we pay these debts?? Arent we paying the banks and goverments enough?? The government tax us, Our taxes pay banks debt, and the loans companys/banks want more money off us?? People all over the UK have to work 2 or more jobs to make ends meet!While our wages are taxed, and deducted to the highest rate in europe....if not the world!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
